page.title: 20Social Concern Uzmaston area
page.content: The {Welsh Office} is planning an { {Eastern by-pass} for {Haverfordwest,} a four lane carriageway along Cartlett Road, relief roads for Prendergast Hill and Old Bridge, improvements to Narberth Road, bridges, slip roads, and five new roundabouts. All this { {Â£5.6 million scheme}will be within the town boundary. Residents are concerned that it will divide and damage the town and its facilities, demolish 22 properties (including businesses offering employment), increase traffic noise, vibration and pollution through town, reduce playing fields at Sir Thomas Picton School, to which their children are zoned,and make pedestrian access to town difficult over bridges. A petition of 5865 signatures calling for an Eastern by-pass only at this time has been presented to a Public Enquiry. UZMASTON WOMEN'S INSTITUTE.
